title: Coronavirus: The month that changed life as we know it
description: A look at how events have unfolded in Scotland since the first case of Covid-19 was confirmed on 1 March.
content:
Image copyrightGetty Images
When the first case of coronavirus was confirmed in Scotland few could have predicted the speed, scale and scope of what happened next. Covid-19 touched everything and changed everything.
It triggered an unprecedented lockdown an… [+13246 chars]
